title: Serious league team looking for a mid and adc gold1+
body: Must have a mic and must be serious about getting on and practicing. Mid should play control mages, adc should play meta picks. We have practice 12-5pm central time on weekdays but that isnt set in stone. The team right now is flexible if you need to play at different times we might be able to work something out and weekends we can practice if everyone can get on.

replies.body: Would you guys be willing to make an exception for a g2 with extensive tournament experience? I’ll get back home in a couple hours and I’ll be able to play then if you guys are still looking for people.
